data.title: Wonderful food and excellent service!
data.text: We eat here often for lunch and no matter the day or time, this place is packed. But he's always got fresh food and the buffet is always full. And he's so friendly, talking to everone, refilling their drink, or whatever they need. This is definitely the best Italian place downtown.

data.title: Absolutely Terrible
data.text:
The service wasn't awful, but the food is... This is a buffet style pizza place. The dough is flavorless and undercooked, it's undersized and topped, and the pastas are lacking in flavor. The salad bar had wilted lettuces and the selection was very slim. The hot food wasn't very hot either... 

If you want pizza (in the OKC business district) you can't beat Café 7 or Louie's. Nebu (in the Devon tower) would be behind those two.

data.title: Great food, even better manager
data.text: This is a self service buffet. The food is great: pizza, ravioli(sp), pasta, sauces, lasagna, salad and soup. You can't beat this place for a great lunch that'll leave you full for the afternoon! Don't wait for the waiter; there isn't one. But if the charming manager sees your plate or glass is empty, he'll take care it! First time, but I will be going back!!!

data.title: Great Lunch Experience
data.text: My wife and I recently ate at the Italian Express in Downtown OKC. We were not wanting to walk over to Bricktown and chose to eat someplace closer to our hotel. We wanted a filling lunch for a reasonable price which we found at Italian Express. The restaurant was really busy when we arrived but the manager/owner immediately sat us and made us feel welcomed. The food was really tasty and exceeded my expectations for flavor and quality. The owner/manager was incredibly helpful and service oriented, which made our lunch even more enjoyable.

data.title: nice lunch
data.text: nice sit down buffet lunch, could be on the run pizza or sit down meal. very nice, not rushed, of course italian food.

data.title: Great for lunch in downtown OKC
data.text: This is a cute place in downtown OKC with a great all you can eat italian buffet for for $6.50. The buffet offers a pretty good variety of food. For the price it is a great place to stop in for lunch and especially if you don't have a lot of time. The service was Amazing!

data.title: Great Italian all you can eat buffet!
data.text: This little place nestled in downtown OKC is only $6.50 for all you can eat!  They have super fresh food cooked daily - best salad bar downtown!  A+ for customer service!

data.title: Great place for lunch
data.text: I eat lunch at Italian Express a lot.  This is a small buffet, but it is always clean and well stocked.  They have salad, pasta, meatballs, Italian sausage Lasagna and pizza.  Their pasta sauce and meatballs are very good.  The pizza is thin crust with lots of toppings.  The owner is so friendly, he makes an effort to get to know everyone and always recognizes you when you walk in the door, it makes you feel like your family.   It is a quick, very inexpensive lunch and very good.
